page.title: 18LIMERIGG WATER SKIING 2
page.content: During the skiing season there are at least 5 major tournaments at the Black Loch and we see many top line skiiers from South of the Border coming North to participate. The other activities at the Black Loch are fishing and swimming. Both these activities have been encouraged by the Slamannan water ski club. During the fishing season there are several competitions at the loch organised by some of the local fishing clubs. Slamannan water ski club has also encouraged the local people to use the loch for bathing and depending on the weather the Black Loch can see quite a turnout of swimmers from all over the country.
